arts.ttl: Messi sets up 2 as Argentina trounce Puerto Rico
arts.sum: Lionel Messi had two assists and helped start a play that led to another goal, as reigning World Cup champion Argentina beat Puerto Rico 6-0 in a relocated international friendly on Tuesday night.

arts.ttl: Messi gets two assists, Argentina beats Puerto Rico 6-0 in relocated soccer friendly
arts.sum: Lionel Messi had two assists and helped start a play that led to another goal, as reigning World Cup champion Argentina beat Puerto Rico 6-0 in a relocated international friendly on Tuesday night. Playing on the field he calls home with Inter Miami in Major League Soccer, Messi flicked a quick lob to set up Gonzalo Montiel’s score in the first half and then had a nifty back pass that created Lautaro Martínez’s second goal of the night in the 83rd minute.

arts.ttl: Inter Milan Superstar To Be Rested In Puerto Rico Vs Argentina Friendly
arts.sum: Argentina head coach Lionel Scaloni will reportedly rest Inter Milan captain Lautaro Martinez in tonight’s international friendly against Puerto Rico. According to TNT Sports Argentina via FCInterNews, El Toro will start the game on the bench. arts.ttl: Puerto Rico vs Argentina – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: Puerto Rico and Argentina go head-to-head in an international friendly on Tuesday night at Chase Stadium in Fort Lauderdale. Argentina is fine-tuning preparations for the 2026 World Cup while Puerto Rico seek to test itself against the world champions in what marks their first-ever meeting.
